entry.source: {F812}Dionysus\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,412003}Hm. I was not expecting a man to be{F801}drawn here by the piquant bouquet{F801}of my wine.{F801}{F802}Very well, fellow oenophilist.{F801}Do you wish a taste of my vintage?{F801}...You may, in exchange for your life.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dionysus\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,412003}Hm. I was not expecting a man to be{F801}drawn here by the piquant bouquet{F801}of my wine.{F801}{F802}Very well, fellow oenophilist.{F801}Do you wish a taste of my vintage?{F801}...You may, in exchange for your life.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon is prepared to attack...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon is prepared to attack...{F801}
